verses.verse: In the <S%H7651%H6240%H8141>seventeenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>.

<S%H6242>Twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337%H6240>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> not that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>.

But he <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, yea, and made his <S%H1121>son<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, according to the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and on the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> and <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>: and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, but <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3898>overcome<s%> him.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H7725>recovered<s%> <S%H359>Elath<s%> to <S%H758%H130>Syria<s%>, and <S%H5394>drave<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> from <S%H359>Elath<s%>: and the <S%H726>Syrians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H359>Elath<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> there unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

So <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H8407>Tiglath-pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>: come <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> me out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against me.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> it for a <S%H7810>present<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto him: for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and <S%H8610>took<s%> it, and carried the people of it <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H7024>Kir<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> <S%H7526>Rezin<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H8407>Tiglath-pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was at <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>: and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H1823>fashion<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of it, according to all the <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> thereof.

And <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> according to all that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>: so <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it against <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>.

And when the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7126>approached<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> thereon.

And he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H5258>poured<s%> his drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> also the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, which was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, from between the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Upon the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and the <S%H6153>evening<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, and his meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, with the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%>; and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> upon it all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>: and the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be for me to <S%H1239>inquire<s%> by.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, according to all that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> cut <S%H7112>off<s%> the <S%H4526>borders<s%> of the <S%H4350>bases<s%>, and <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> from off them; and took <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> from off the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> that were under it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon a <S%H4837>pavement<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>.

And the <S%H4329%H4329>covert<s%> for the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> that they had <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3996>entry<s%> <S%H2435>without<s%>, <S%H5437>turned<s%> he from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

¶ Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697%H3117>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: and <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
